title: Vuelta a España Stage 7: Sepp Kuss Plays ‘MVP’ As Wout van Aert Scores Bulldozing Sprint Win
content:
Kuss helps lead Van Aert to Belgian's second victory of La Vuelta, O'Connor defends red through series of late GC skirmishes.

Read the full article at Vuelta a España Stage 7: Sepp Kuss Plays ‘MVP’ As Wout van Aert Scores Bulldozing Sprint Win on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
